*`TipTipBehavior/TipTipMarkupContainer`* ([http://code.drewwilson.com/entry/tiptip-jquery-plugin original javascript version])

Java-Code:
{{{
add(new GenericTipTipBehavior(".someClass", 
          new TipTipOptions().content("<h3>custom dynamic tooltip</h3>").maxWidth("auto")));

add(new Link<Void>("tiptip") {
   @Override
   public void onClick() {}
}.add(new TipTipBehavior(
          new TipTipOptions().maxWidth("auto").edgeOffset(10))));
}}}

HTML-Template:
{{{
<p>
Cras sed ante. Phasellus in massa. <a wicket:id="tiptip" title="This will show up in the TipTip popup.">Curabitur dolor eros</a>, 
gravida et, hendrerit ac, cursus non, massa.
<br/><br/>
<span id="foo">
<img src="_images/tiptip/walle.jpg" class="someClass" />
</span>
</p>
}}}

Rendered HTML-Code:
{{{
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN"
	"http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xml:lang="en" lang="en">
<head>
<title>TipTip example</title>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.4.4/jquery.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jqueryui/1.8.6/jquery-ui.min.js"></script>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jqueryui/1.8.6/themes/base/jquery-ui.css" />
<script type="text/javascript" src="resources/net.javaforge.jqwicket.ui.tiptip.TipTipOptions/jquery.tipTip.minified.js"></script>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="resources/net.javaforge.jqwicket.ui.tiptip.TipTipOptions/tipTip.css" />
<script type="text/javascript" id="b6523035-67aa-4bc5-ad84-905c6736de59"><!--/*--><![CDATA[/*><!--*/
$(document).ready(function(){$('.someClass').tipTip({content:'<h3>this is custom dynamic tooltip</h3>', maxWidth:'auto'});
$('#tiptip1').tipTip({maxWidth:'auto', edgeOffset:10});});
/*-->]]>*/</script>
</head>
<body> 
<div class="demo">
<p>
Cras sed ante. Phasellus in massa. <a title="This will show up in the TipTip popup." id="tiptip1" 
href="?wicket:interface=:0:tiptip::ILinkListener::">Curabitur dolor eros</a>, gravida et, hendrerit ac, cursus non, massa.
<br/><br/>
<span id="foo">
<img src="_images/tiptip/walle.jpg" class="someClass"/>
</span>
</p>
</div>
</body>
